title: Call Sign Karma
description: LOVE IN THE NO-FLY ZONE...  Distraught over the loss of her brother in a fighter jet accident, Tinklee Pinkerton decides to follow in his footsteps--and prove the tragedy wasn't his fault. But when she's chosen as the first woman to fly the Air Force's F-35, her plan for a life that revolves around work is thrown off course by a handsome, mysterious stranger... Thanks to Locke's seductive British accent, sweet nature, and one too many beers, Tink is soon inspired to throw caution to the wind--and herself into his arms. She thinks maybe love can heal after all--until she discovers Locke is her superior officer. Tink has no problem risking her life inÂ the air, but with everything on the line, is she brave enough to risk her heart on the ground? 89,811 Words
author: Jamie Rae
